Plot: 15-year-old Oliver Tate has two objectives: To lose his virginity before his next birthday, and to extinguish the flame between his mother and an ex-lover who has resurfaced in her life.
Title: Submarine
Actors: Noah Taylor, Paddy Considine, Craig Roberts, Yasmin Paige
tomatoConsensus: Funny, stylish, and ringing with adolescent truth, Submarine marks Richard Ayoade as a talent to watch.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 6 wins & 13 nominations.
